Create Hexagonal logo for MetaPipe

Source: R/plot-utils.R
hex_logo.Rd

Create Hexagonal logo for MetaPipe

hex_logo(
  subplot = system.file("images/lab-2.png", package = "MetaPipe"),
  dpi = 800,
  h_color = "#000000",
  h_fill = "#363b74",
  output = system.file("images/metapipe.png", package = "MetaPipe"),
  p_color = "#eeeeee"
)

Arguments

subplot

subplot/image/icon to be used in the background
dpi

dots per inch
h_color

hexagon edge colour
h_fill

hexagon filling colour
output

output filename and path
p_color

package name colour

Examples

if (FALSE) {
    hex_logo()
}
